levels.description:
Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</> and attacks <@ba.vup>2</> enemies simultaneously. Every attack deals <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> of ATK as Physical damage. <$ba.charged>Charged</> effect: Changes to attacking <@ba.vup>3</> enemies simultaneously and skill duration is extended to <@ba.vup>{enhance_duration}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>Can manually deactivate skill (skill can be deactivated at will)</>

<@ba.rem>Can manually deactivate skill (skill can be deactivated at will)</>
